Synopsis: Displays the properties of an object in a verbose manner.
Description: This function takes an object as input and displays each property of the object in a verbose format.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
$data = [PSCustomObject]@{
    Name = "John Doe"
    Age = 30
    City = "New York"
}
Show-DataInVerbose -Object $data
Description:
Displays the properties of the $data object in a verbose manner.
